body:
fixes #13045

When removing support for dotkit in #11986 the code trying to set the paths of the various module files was not updated to skip it. This results in a failure because of a key error after the deprecation
warning is displayed to user.

This commit fixes the issue and adds a unit test for regression. Note that code for Spack chains has been updated accordingly but no unit test has been added for that case.
title: Fixed issue caused by a custom dotkit root present in config.yaml
